channel.title: Cavitation – Medika Supplies
channel.description: Supply quality products to the medical industries

item.title: EPILMAX G-LIGHT 500
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
Epilmax G-Light 500 is the model of the well proven line of machines IPL Equipped with the new technology PULSED LIGHT. In addition to the traditional feature of removing undesired hair permanently, includes the very new Anti Age function.
HAIR REMOVAL FUNCTION
Laser epilation consists in the use of the laser energy for a definitive hair reduction . Epilmax G-Light emits a flash of very high intensity light energy that get absorbed by the hair’s melanin pigment, thus causing a fast overheating of the hair follicle. The heat destroys the dermal papilla (hair follicle), responsible of the hair’s growth.
REJUVENATION FUNCTION “Skin photorejuvenation” means a group of dermatological procedures that use specific high-intensity pulsed light sources (IPL), to generate corrective biological effects in the tissues altered by photoaging (sun damage), chronological ageing (age), and other gained alterations Epilmax G-Light can be easily carried and used in comfortably at home; it permits to reduce hair according to your needs, always and everywhere.
item.content:encoded:
TECHNICAL FEATURES
Bandwidth 470/1100 nm
Power output: 1,8J/cm (Rejuvenation)
Power output: da 3 a 5 J/cm2 (Epilation)
Lamps duration : 6000 flash (Epilation)
Lamps duration: 20.000 flash
(Rejuvenation)
Unit weight: 1.7 kg
Power supply: rete a 220V.

ACCESSORIES INCLUDED
1 IPL Unit
2 Xenon Lamps
1 Cable adapter
1 User’s manual

item.title: LIPOZERO Aesthetic Ultrasound
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
LIPOZERO EXCEL is part of the New GLOBUS HOME CARE line, and has been studied to realise at home beauty centre professional style treatments. It allows to treat the most common imperfections due to cellulite and fat accumulation.
The new portable design and the graphic menu have been studied for the Home – domestic use and makes it userfriendly even for non experienced users. · Very easy to use · Large backlight display · Pre-stored working protocols · Programmable
NEW STYLISH CARRYING CASE: LIPOZERO EXCEL is supplied with a convenient and modern aluminium carrying case to transport it easily and in a stylish way
7 PROGRAMS - 1 Free: CELLULITE CHOCK STRETCH MARKS DRAINAGE MASSAGE MODELLING ACTIVE PRINCIPLES APPLICATION (oils and creams)
item.content:encoded:
TECHNICAL FEATURES
Power: 1.2 W/cm2
Output: 1 Head: 1 x Ø mm42 – IP65
Power Supply: main 220V 50/60 Hz and
rechargeable batteries (in option)
Dimensions: 10 x 16 x 3.5 cm
Graphic Display
Emission: continued and pulsed
Emission Frequency: 3 MHz

EQUIPMENT
1 carrying case
1 ultrasound Lipozero ExCel
1 Head (3 MHz)
1 contact gel bottle
1 Power pack
1 operating manual

item.title: LIPOZERO G150 Aesthetic Cavitation
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
9 CaviMax150 –10 MF-Plus - 5 Adipose Mobilization NorAd- 526 - 2 Man Adiposity - 8 Beauty – 8 Skin Ultrasonic CAVITATION is the most efficient methodology to fight Cellulite and to eliminate excess fat MECHANISM:
  • When adipose tissue is submitted to deep low frequency ultrasonic energy, a succession of cyclical compression and decompression which produce cavities containing gases and vapours.
  • Thanks to this process, the cavities continue to expand and compress till they explode, destroying in the process the fat cell membrane.
  • The fat contained in the adipocytes is freed and eliminated through blood circulation without damaging the surrounding tissues.
THE GLOBUS PROFESSIONAL CAVITATION FREQUENCIES The cavitation effect is efficiently produced only with low frequencies, lower than 600 KHz, because they are the only one able to penetrate in depth to destroy the adipose tissue. Lower the frequency, deeper is the action of the ultrasonic wave. - 150 KHz for adiposity and Cellulite less thick and less deep (Professional) - 526 KHz to associate the adipose destruction with the production of Noradrenalin (NorAd-526) which helps to burn fat thanks to the increase of the metabolism. Specially used for the adiposity of the men abdomen - 3 MHz for superficial beauty treatments and for skin treatments. MF PLUS - MULTIFREQUENCY TREATMENTS: GLOBUS WORLD FIRST Scientific researches have demonstrated that the application of Cavitation with Frequency Modulation (alternation of different frequencies) produce better results because the association of different frequencies allows to act at various depth and allows to personalize the treatment according to the type of cellulite. NEW STYLISH CARRYING CASE: LIPOZERO G150 is supplied with a convenient and modern aluminium carrying case to transport it easily and in a stylish way.
item.content:encoded:
TECHNICAL FEATURES
Power: 3 W/cm2
Output: 1 – Head: 1 Ø mm42 – IP 65
Power Supply: mains 220V 50/60 Hz and
rechargeable battery (optional)

KHz and 150 KHz

1 ultrasound Lipozero G150
1 Multi-frequency Head (3 e 1 MHz, 526
and 150 KHz )
1 contact gel bottle
1 Power Pack
1 operating manual

item.title: LIPOZERO G39 Professional Cavitation
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
4 UltraCav39 - 6 CaviMax150 – 10 MF-Plus - 5 Adipose Mobilization NorAd-526 – 4 Man Adiposity - 10 Beauty – 10 Skin Ultrasonic CAVITATION is the most efficient methodology to fight Cellulite and to eliminate excess fat. MECHANISM:
  • When adipose tissue is submitted to deep low frequency ultrasonic energy, a succession of cyclical compression and decompression which produce cavities containing gases and vapours.
  • Thanks to this process, the cavities continue to expand and compress till they explode, destroying in the process the fat cell membrane.
  • The fat contained in the adipocytes is freed and eliminated through blood circulation without damaging the surrounding tissues.
THE GLOBUS PROFESSIONAL CAVITATION FREQUENCIES The cavitation effect is efficiently produced only with low frequencies, lower than 600 KHz, because they are the only one able to penetrate in depth to destroy the adipose tissue. Lower the frequency, deeper is the action of the ultrasonic wave. - 39 KHz for adiposity and Cellulite particularly thick and deep that need an strong action (Top Professional) - 150 KHz for adiposity and Cellulite less thick and less deep (Professional) - 526 KHz to associate the adipose destruction with the production of Noradrenalin (NorAd-526) which helps to burn fat thanks to the increase of the metabolism. Specially used for the adiposity of the men abdomen - 3 MHz for superficial beauty treatments and for skin treatments. MF PLUS - MULTIFREQUENCY TREATMENTS: GLOBUS WORLD FIRST Scientific researches have demonstrated that the application of Cavitation with Frequency Modulation (alternation of different frequencies) produce better results because the association of different frequencies allows to act at various depth and allows to personalize the treatment according to the type of cellulite. NEW STYLISH CARRYING CASE: LIPOZERO G39 is supplied with a convenient and modern aluminium carrying case to transport it easily and in a stylish way.
